summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Defense Project Management System MVP. Backend APIs functional with 88.2% success rate. Frontend fully operational with military tactical theme, all 10 modules accessible, dashboard KPIs working, and navigation functioning correctly.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns non-JSON response causing parsing errors
flaky_endpoints.impact: Cannot create new projects via API

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns non-JSON response causing parsing errors
flaky_endpoints.impact: Cannot create new risks via API

ui_bugs.issue: Logout functionality not implemented in user menu

passed_tests: All GET endpoints (programs, projects, tasks, resources, budget, risks, vendors, approvals)
Login page with military tactical theme
Dashboard with Budget Utilization chart and Portfolio Health
Navigation to all 10 module pages (Programs, Projects, Tasks, Resources, Budget, Risks, Vendors, Reports)
Project creation form UI (fields and validation)
Task management interface with status filtering
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix POST endpoint responses to return proper JSON format for project and risk creation. Implement logout functionality in user menu.
